about_the_game:
Sweet VTuber Shooter - In this era of developed Internet, there are many emerging industries. VTuber is one of them. This game is based on VTuber. Players can choose one of ten VTuber girls to participate in a game with other girls. It’s a Zhutai game, but the girl who loses has to do sexy things~~~

This game is a pinball-like game. Players only need to control the attack direction of pinballs and increase their level to defeat other VTuber girls. Whenever a girl's HP reaches 0, the girl's character will transform into the next erotic picture (masturbation or masturbation with props, etc.). Players can also go to the gallery to review the erotic pictures of defeated VTuber girls at any time.

  • In the gallery, you can press "A", "D" or the left and right arrow keys to switch to the previous or next picture.

  • Use the mouse wheel to zoom in or out the image, and press the mouse left or right to drag the image.

  • There are currently ten VTuber girls in the game~~~

* Image size is 960x1088 px

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32/64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
